page.title: 16A Village Fete.
page.content: {Sutton-on-Derwent Village Fete The Fete is a village garden party with attractions and side shows.It is organised by the Village Hall Committee and the Church Council.The money raised by the Fete is used to run the Village Hall and help in the upkeep of the Church. There are a wide variety of stalls and attractions at the Fete including a White Elephant stall,a Plant stall,a Toy stall,a Hot_Dog trolley,a Refreshment stall and a Tombola. {A Tombola stall is where prizes are {placed on a table with a numbered {label. A large drum at one side {contains numbered tickets.Some of {these correspond to the numbers on the {labels. The object is to draw one of {these out of the drum so that a prize {is obtained. } (continued on next page)
